import React, { Component } from 'react'; import ReactTooltip from 'react-tooltip'; import api from '../../../../services/api' class OrderList extends Component{ state = { orders: [], users: [], contagem: '', detalha: [] } async componentDidMount() { const res = await api.get('/auth/user') const response = await api.get('/auth/order') if(response) { this.setState({ orders: response.data, contagem: response.data.length }) this.setState({ users: res.data }) } } async detalhaProduto(order_id) { const response = await api.get(`/auth/order/${order_id}`); if(response) { this.setState({ detalha: response.data }) } console.log(response.data) } render() { const { users, orders } = this.state; return(
